column1: #Text=Suki says : " There 's no time to say goodbye . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I treated you like a girl when I should 've treated you like a warrior . "
#Text=" Zuko says : " Back to the ship !
#Text=" Katara says : " I know it 's hard , but you did the right thing .
#Text=Zuko would have destroyed the whole place if we had stayed .
#Text=" Katara says : " What are you doing ?
